title: Writing shit daily
lede: If you want to know how to make software that connects with and works for real people, there's no substitute for shaking hands with the invisible demons programmers wrestle with.

title: Hello, habit
lede: On how I will stop being "goal perfect" to the point of writing paralysis and instead aim for a daily habit of writing by blogging. Keep drafting until I get somewhere. I'll make it a habits, not a goal.
